events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle and a tree on April 30th, 2024. Claim was officially filed this morning for further processing.
After initial review, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords including car, accident, and vehicle mentioned in the report.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to assist the customer, ensuring knowledgeable support throughout the process.
The insurance company sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming the claim has been received and is now under review.
Requested submission of photos of the damaged vehicle, police collision report, and insurance documents to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos, the police accident report, and previous vehicle inspection records for claim review.
The claim investigation has commenced with assigned experts reviewing submitted evidence to determine liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded successfully, confirming the accident circumstances and validating the claim eligibility for damage reimbursement.
An initial settlement offer has been proposed to the customer based on the repair estimates and policy coverage conditions.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and prompt attention to their claim.
With all terms agreed upon, the claim has been officially approved by the insurance team for payout processing.
The approved settlement amount has been disbursed to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The case has been closed following payment confirmation and completion of all required claim processing steps.
All claim files and documents have been securely archived for future reference according to company retention policy.
